member.name: T:JetBrains.CommandLine.Interop.Logging.LoggingOptions
member.summary:
Logging options provided via command line interface.
This class intended to be used with ICommandLineMapper

member.name: T:JetBrains.CommandLine.Interop.Profiler.ProfilerCoreOptions
member.summary:
Profiler core options provided via command line interface.
This class intended to be used with ICommandLineMapper
member.remarks:
Why not in `Profiler` sub-platform?
This is because options model is used both for parsing and for building command line. For example, when starting dotMemoryUnit from VS. So it looks strange to reference `Profiler` from VS integration plug-in.
